Name: copyin
Description: copyin is a clause that can be used in a parallel construct; it acts as a mechanism to broadcast the value of a threadprivate variable from the master thread to the threadprivate variable of every other thread in the team executing the parallel region.

Parameters.Name: list
Parameters.Description: The variables to pass as copyin, separated by commas.

Return.Description:
The error code returned from the memory address retrieval.
- MPI_SUCCESS: The routine successfully completed.

Parameters.Name: location
Parameters.Description: The element to obtain the address of.

Parameters.Name: address
Parameters.Description: The variable in which store the address of the element passed.

Parameters.Name: ierror
Parameters.Description:
The error code returned from the memory address retrieval.

  • MPI_SUCCESS: The routine successfully completed.
